dataIdInfo.idPurp: Dataset for MAPC's Rethinking the Suburban Strip research report.
dataIdInfo.idAbs: This dataset accompanies MAPC's Rethinking the Suburban Strip research report (rethinking-the-suburban-strip.mapc.org). It includes all of the variables used to identify low-density commercial properties in the MAPC region; all of the variables used to score these sites in their potential for redevelopment as mixed-use or residential properties along the dimensions of growth potential, transit access, watershed health, and community health; and estimates of property tax potential for a redeveloped site.

attr.attrdef: Internal feature number.

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Feature geometry.
Unique integer ID for each site in the MAPC region.
Unique integer ID for each municipality in Massachusetts.
Municipality (city or town) name. Sites assigned to municipality in which centroid falls.
Integer ID of MAPC Community Type for the municipality
Integer ID of MAPC Community Subtype for the municipality
MAPC Community Type of municipality
County in which site is located.
Name of principal MAPC subregion in which site is located.
Integer ID of MAPC housing submarket in which site is located.
If in a transit station area, MAPC classification of transit area type.
Number of Parcels included in site
MAPC-format IDs of parcels on site.
Short-form string-format list of the parcel addresses on each site
Primary route number for MA state roadway adjacent to site (if any)
Name of closest transit station, if site within half mile of station.
Type of closest transit station, if site within half mile of station.
Bus route and line number if site within half mile of bus line.
Combined assessed land value of all parcels in site
Combined assessed building value of all parcels in site
Combined assessed other value on all parcels in site
Combined assessed total value of all parcels on site
Ratio of assessed building value to assessed land value (current conditions)
Year built, according to local assessor. If multiple parcels, most recent construction year is shown.
Site buildable area in acres
Assessed land value per acre for entire site
Site area in acres
Impervious area on site, based on 2005 aerial photography (acres)
Paved area on site, based on 2005 aerial photography (acres)
Straight-line distance to nearest known sewer line.
Walk score at site.
Index measure of how many public school grades are available withing walking distance. Range 0-7.
Percent of commuters in the surrounding census tract who commute by methods other than automobiles, 2013 - 2017
Total jobs accessible via transit in 45 minutes or less during morning rush hour, 2018.

attr.attalias: Jobs within 30 minutes by personal car
attr.attrdef: Total jobs accessible via car in 30 minutes or less during morning rush hour, 2018.
Percent site's area that overlaps with Chapter 21E oil and hazardous material release site
Percent site's area that overlaps with MassDEP Activity Use Limitation (AUL) site
Percent site's area that overlap with 1% Federal Emergency Management Agency (FEMA) Special Flood Hazard Area (SFHA)
Percent site's area that overlaps with 0.2% Federal Emergency Management Agency (FEMA) flood zones
Percent site's area that overlaps with non-buildable area
Percent site's area that overlaps with Zone 2 Wellhead Protection Area (WPA)

attr.attalias: Overlap with permanently protected open space (%)
attr.attrdef: Percent overlap with permanently protected open space
Percent overlap with MassDEP wetland or 100-ft buffer
Estimated number of housing units that could be built on the site assuming 100% residential
Estimated number of housing units that could be built on the site if part of first floor dedicated to commercial space
Estimated current annual tax revenue from site, based on assessed value and local tax rate
Estimated potential annual tax revenue from site, based on estimated units assuming all-residential new development, new construction values, and local tax rate
Current Floor Area Ratio (FAR), based on local assessor data
Healthy Communities Score
Travel Choices Score
Growth Potential Score
Overall Score
Integer representing which regional quintile site's overall score falls into
Difference between estimated pre- and post-retrofit tax revenue, based on change in building value
Site's rank by overall score relative to other sites in the city or town.
Site's rank by overall score relative to other sites in the MAPC region.
Site's overall score percentile relative to other sites in the same city or town.
Integer representing which municipal quintile the site's overall score falls into
Site's overall score percentile relative to other sites in the MAPC region.
Site centroid longitude coordinate.
Site centroid latitude coordinate.
Area of feature in internal units squared.

attrdomv.udom: Positive real numbers that are automatically generated.
